sourcesContent:
import { View, ImageBackground, Image } from 'react-native'
import React from 'react'
import Text from '../../components/Text'
import images from '../../assets/image/'
import { HEIGHT, WIDTH } from '../../assets/styles'

export default function Profile() {
    return (
        <View>
            <ImageBackground
                source={images.BG_PROFILE}
                resizeMode='cover'
                style={{
                    width: WIDTH,
                    height: 495,
                    paddingTop: 90,
                    alignItems: 'center',
                }}
            >
                <View style={{ borderWidth: 2, borderColor: '#FBD2A5', borderRadius: 90 }}>
                    <Image
                        source={images.PERSON2}
                        style={{
                            width: 120,
                            height: 120,
                            borderRadius: 90,
                        }}
                    ></Image>
                </View>
                <Text fontSize={20} bold style={{ marginTop: 16 }}>Ahmad Akbar Maulana</Text>
                <Text bold color="#909090" style={{ paddingBottom: 32 }}>React Native Developer</Text>

                <View style={{
                    paddingHorizontal: 16,
                    backgroundColor: "#fff",
                    borderRadius: 12,
                    shadowColor: '#000',
                    shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 2 },
                    shadowOpacity: 0.3,
                    shadowRadius: 4,
                    elevation: 5
                }}>
                    <View style={{ justifyContent: "space-between", padding: 5, flexDirection: "row" }}>
                        <Text fontSize={14} bold style={{ paddingTop: 16 }}>ID</Text>
                        <Text fontSize={14} color="#A7A7A7" style={{ paddingTop: 16, paddingLeft: 16 }}>A20134</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={{ paddingTop: 13, paddingleft: 16, paddjustifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center' }}>
                        <View style={{ paddingLeft: 16, height: 1, width: 311.00644, borderBottomColor: 'black', borderBottomWidth: 1 }} />
                    </View>

                    <View style={{ justifyContent: "space-between", padding: 5, flexDirection: "row" }}>
                        <Text fontSize={14} bold style={{ paddingTop: 16 }}>Email</Text>
                        <Text fontSize={14} color="#A7A7A7" style={{ paddingTop: 16, paddingLeft: 16 }}>siapayaamanyanyah@gmail.com</Text>
                    </View>

                    <View style={{ paddingTop: 13, paddingleft: 16, paddjustifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center' }}>
                        <View style={{ paddingLeft: 16, height: 1, width: 311.00644, borderBottomColor: 'black', borderBottomWidth: 1 }} />
                    </View>

                    <View style={{ justifyContent: "space-between", padding: 5, flexDirection: "row" }}>
                        <Text fontSize={14} bold style={{ paddingTop: 16 }}>Date of Birth</Text>
                        <Text fontSize={14} color="#A7A7A7" style={{ paddingTop: 16, paddingLeft: 16 }}>3 May 1999</Text>
                    </View>

                    <View style={{ paddingTop: 13, paddingleft: 16, paddjustifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center' }}>
                        <View style={{ paddingHorizontal: 16, height: 1, width: 311.00644, borderBottomColor: 'black', borderBottomWidth: 1 }} />
                    </View>
                    <View style={{ justifyContent: "space-between", padding: 5, flexDirection: "row" }}>
                        <Text fontSize={14} bold style={{ paddingTop: 16, paddingBottom: 16 }}>Gender</Text>
                        <Text fontSize={14} color="#A7A7A7" style={{ paddingTop: 16, paddingLeft: 16, paddingBottom: 16 }}>Male</Text>
                    </View>

                </View>
                <View style={{
                    paddingHorizontal: 16,
                    backgroundColor: "#fff",
                    borderRadius: 12,
                    shadowColor: '#000',
                    shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 2 },
                    shadowOpacity: 0.3,
                    shadowRadius: 4,
                    elevation: 5,
                    flexDirection: "row",
                    alignItems: "center"
                }}>
                   
                    <Image
                        source={images.PERSON2}
                        style={{
                            width: 35,
                            height: 35,
                            borderRadius: 90,
                            marginLeft: 'auto',
                            marginRight: 16
                        }}
                    />
                </View>
                {/* <Text fontSize={36} bold color={"green"} >Ini Test Fonts
                </Text> */}
            </ImageBackground>
        </View>
    )
}
